title: 1st game of day ALWAYS crashes
body: every single day for me the first game i play crashes straight after champion select and wont let me back in for 5 minutes,  no matter what i try... all other games i try are fine afterwards...whats worse the fact that it crashes for 5 minutes so often (daily) i get put into the retarded low priority queue and have to waste a total of 50 minutes just queueing...can you please fix this or do something about how anal your leaverbuster is...

replies.body:
That could be because your computer is performing maintenence whenever it boots up. Can you view your task scheduler (or equivalent) to see what services begin with your computer, and experiment to see which one might be causing this to happen?

Also, what sort of a crash are you talking about here? Is it that the screen goes black/unresponsive/freezes mid-game/firewall error message/just doesn't load?

its not the computer, i can restart my computer after my 1st game and have no issues, its only ever the first game i play after the ranked deactivates then reactivates...and it just doesnt load, but then when i use task manager to close everything to do with lol and restart, when i try to reload it then comes up with firewall error at around 90%...after that i restart again and its fine but by then the game is already 5 minutes in...its gone on so long that i am now in the 20 minute low priority queue...i have spent a lot of money and time on this game...i never had this problem in the past, (only appeared last month) and if i am unable to play i will seriously have to stop playing cus of frustration or i get banned (whichever happens first)...which i dont want to do as i enjoy this game and the friends i have made...if this cant be fixxed can i just get a refund on my purchases, my account disabled and i will move on sadly.
on a side note, today it only took me 3 minutes to connect, (this time it didn't do the firewall error) and i was able to secure first blood :D

>if this cant be fixxed can i just get a refund on my purchases

Firstly, I'm not a Riot employee. I don't have any control over the money you gave to them. In the EULA, you agreed to the fact that any money which you pay to their online service is not eligible for refund period. It's still possible for you to get a refund via something like Paypass, if that was how you paid, because you could claim you paid for a service that was not delivered.

Leaverbuster is very strict at the moment because of the lack of a Tribunal or any sort of manual banning. It's sad but required to maintain a relatively healthy game-state.

How about, try running a custom game first thing in the morning and see if you can connect to that? If it doesn't load the custom game, you won't get penalised. Then, after quitting the custom game, you might be able to join a ranked game no worries. By no means would this be a solution, but it would allow you to continue playing without getting constantly Leaverbuster'd.

Have you performed any maintenance on your computer recently, such as cleaning out the case for dust, cleaning the hard-disk if it's near full, defrag (though that doesn't really do anything), registry clean, update graphics driver, etc.?

I do all the things on that maintenance list monthly (or if i forget, every second month) XD i did a computing course so i know how dusty things can get in there XD...also i cant believe i never thought of custom games -_- thanks, i'll try that XD also, for not being a riot employee, you are very nice for helping others as i have seen you post on quite a few other problems :)
and in the contract they did say no refunds, but if they are breaking the contract by penalising me for afk when it is most likely a problem with their servers, then they should be liable for any losses (or so i've been told). and before anyone thinks its just a way to get my money back...i only suggested that as a final option, i still want to play league, i like the skins i bought, i use every single one i purchased regularly and i continue to buy skins that i like.

ok...so after 4 attempts to do the custom game (it kept quitting the whole thing cus of the dc >.>) i finally got in, played for 5 minutes and then quit...game completely froze for 5 minutes after that XD. but no problems once i get into my other game...not an ideal fix but will have to do for now >.<

Alright, so you have a way to play the game without getting punished. That's great, but not a permanent solution.

A few things to try:

1. Repair the client, via the patcher. Remember to back up your settings and item sets, as they are erased without warning!
2. Update your graphics drivers specifically. Most commonly this is done by going to the manufacturer's website and dowloading a program which downloads and installs the drivers. Each company is different. You can usually check what manufacturer's site you should visit by running dxdiag.exe.
3. Lower the graphics settings. It might just be stressing your graphics card out, initially, or blowing some sort of figurative fuse (which would explain why it's fine the rest of the day).

Best of luck.

what i dont get though...the only thing that is common with my first game crashing is the ranked reset...its the first game after that no matter what time i play the first game...(i experimented within a month XD) any theories on that part? XD because obviously my theory is server bug because restarting computer doesnt cause it, i keep my computer maintained and my specs are more than the recommended that they suggested themselves.

So how long have you been playing without this bug?

Have you tried what I suggested?

i've been playing since draven was released in season 2 XD own and play all champs and almost have a skin for each of them XD

i also check graphics driver updates weekly.

i'm about to try the graphics suggestion now :)

(the most annoying part of this problem is that i can only troubleshoot once a day...)

If that doesn't work, back up your item sets and settings, then completely uninstall League. Delete the "Riot Games" folder from your hard-drive and then reset your computer. Reinstall League and start up a game. After that test, restore your item sets and settings.

ok...so yesterday, went into the game to change the graphics settings, but the game loaded perfectly >.> had 0 problem yesterday...custom game loaded first try today as well...either it is fixed (just before i reduced graphics) or i got lucky these last 2 days...hoping its gone for good, but its gonna bug me for ages, i really wanted to find out what was wrong XD

Very, very strange. Might be worth looking into your System Restore entries to see if there was anything significant happening to your computer during that time.

Either, it's good to hear that it's all good now. Best of luck on the fields of juice!

Well, I guess ultimately you're entitled to a refund if you use the Australian Consumer laws, ie. you paid for a service which was faulty and did not meet expectations.

If Riot wanted to challenge it, though, you'd have to hire a lawyer and get a court date, and in the end that might cost more money than what you originally spent on the skins.
